reviews.review: bubba
개재밌음

My mates and I have played this game on and off since a free weekend sometime last year. It's a game where you can become incredibly frustrated, yell and scream at your own (or your friends) fails and find reasons to blame the rando's on why your side lost. 

Personally I play both killer and survivor, and they both have their pro's and cons. The toxic community is a concern, but, if you can just embrace that you wont win every round and that anyone getting out is a win for the survivor, and killing anyone is a win for the killer... you might just hold onto your sanity!
Great game most of the time. Kinda of expesisve dlcs but deff worth the base price.

GARBAGE GAME!, it is so fun at first but it all goes downhill from once you are experienced as a killer.
The game is super survivor sided and is not very fun unless you only use the best killers. Unplayable at a high level. The developers care more about releasing the weekly cosmetic pack than making the game more fun. Fun for new players but once you play for a while it gets terrible. All of the reviews from high hour count players (me being at almost 450hrs) say the same thing. Don't expect to start playing this game a lot and have fun. DON'T WASTE YOUR TIME!

Dead by daylight is one of those games where you don't go into it expecting to win. Winning doesn't always mean getting out alive either. Dead by daylight is toxic, it is a game where everyone has an opinion on how it should be ran, unwritten rules on how each side should play the game. Its always unbalanced for the other side, according to the other side. 

The big 10 thousand dollar issue for me is the high skill gap within the game, newer people will be turned off to this game between unrelenting and unforgiving other side, and the eat each other community. The game is fun yes. As a person who has been to rank 1 and back to rank 20, been playing since when Freddy was first announced, The game gets changes on a very regular basis but this game somehow finds a way to mess something up, or screw one side with an update. 

Playing custom games with friends as of late has probably been some of the better time for me than to grind hours and hours into public ranks just to get memed on by a Legion or basement camping bubba who takes the game too seriously, or just wants you to feed them salt so they can be smug on their twitch channel.  

As much as I enjoy this game, and all the positive and negative times I've played this game I honestly cant find a reason to recommend this game to new people unless you want to  suffer for your first 50 hours so you can figure out how to loop a killer for longer than 5 seconds.

muy buen juego para pasar el rato
BUENARDO

入坑之前先玩的第五人格，入坑后发现杀鸡和五格是两个游戏，从此抛弃了五格爱上了杀鸡。总的看，杀鸡联动了许多款经典的恐怖电影（电锯惊魂等）以及经典的恐怖游戏（生化危机），光是这一点就有足够的吸引力。但是如果你真的很爱这款游戏并且想把它玩好的话，是需要投入很多精力的。
就本人而言，从萌新时期（听到心跳就到处跑，被无心跳屠夫鼠标吓飞，晚上做梦听见兔妈唱歌惊醒）到对游戏有个整体的理解（知道各杀手特征和游戏内双边的主要技能以及游戏的双边思路）大约是两百小时以后的事情了。因为一开始我不知道b站的一些up主，很多机制纯属是自己摸索。刚入坑的话建议先看看百科（比如小黑盒百科）大概知道一下前期要做什么，比如点出人类关键技能的传承（自摸钢筋怀表咬根等）。然后就是看看up主的视频（人类可以看付导离枯十里晴川等；屠夫可以看193青铜树海等），学一下双边基本打法，什么时候干什么事。后期再学习更多的技巧。
就总体游戏体验而言，到了一两百小时（人类时间）以后，就不再会觉得屠夫恐怖了，慢慢可以体会到你是在和屏幕对面一名玩家在进行博弈，和三名玩家合作。虽然偶尔遇到糟心的体验（高配守尸还嘲讽的屠夫玩家）（炸鱼手电侠）但是合作逃跑，尽力控机 击杀留住4人的游戏乐趣。总之，这款游戏能带给你酸甜苦辣。
如今我是个近五百小时的玩家，我知道自己还有点菜，但是真的很不希望看到本就不多的玩家里重重地戾气，也希望尽自己的力量邀请并帮助更多的萌新入坑。

Dead By Daylight is an incredible Horror / Survivor game. It features incredible graphics and amazing gameplay for its price! Other than the slight price tag on content in the game, its constant updates and DLC drops have to make this one of the best games of its kind and a MUST HAVE for the horror and thriller enthusiasts out there! 

Only issue I have with this game is that there is no casual mode for Killers or Survivors where their ranks are not affected. This is nothing but a slight disturbance for people who don't like competitive games.

This game has drastically improved my life. It's incredibly flawed, incredibly frustrating, and incredibly beautiful with a wonderful community of people who also enjoy complaining about it. The complaining is part of the experience of loving it; I would absolutely recommend this game, it has brought me joy, it has brought me new friendships, and it has strengthened my old friendships. Happy 1000 hours to me and DBD, may we have many thousands more together.

The game at first when i started playing was such a fun and terrifying game to play with friends. It was refreshing to have moments in the game where you felt like you could goof off. After playing for some time you finally learn the mechanics and the game after some time becomes a little repetitive. It would be nice if they could come up with maybe more ways to hide or  different elements. I am happy they are polishing the game a little more but i would love to see new elements that would freshen the game up. That doesnt mean more new killers. I love the ones we have but instead of milking out killers i would love new things.
I cant believe players that crouch around the map, I literally dont  think theyre human + solo queuing is very bad (only fun with friends).

Game has a myriad of balance issues.  They punish players for disconnect, but do not punish kilers that face camp, troll or work with other players to throw the game.  Reporting function is for show only.  They ignore VOD's, email, steam and in game reports.

If you choose to play this game know you are playing against the game+killer, as many of the time sensitive player actions are simply broken.  Don't get me started on net code.
